outputs.output_descr: The present project takes a long-term approach to democratic governance institutions and actors through the Bahrain Institute for Political Development (BIPD), and as such seeks to affect the following outcomes: a culture a culture a culture of democracy with popular understanding and appreciation of democratic values; enhanced practical knowledge of governance norms and standards, Human Rights and parliamentary strengthening to support the governance reform process.

project_descr: Bahrain Institute for Political Development - Supporting Political Reform in Partnership with the Bahrain Institute for Political Development (BIPD)
